title: Amulet of eternal glory

properties.name: description
properties.value: The amulet of eternal glory is a special dragonstone amulet possessing identical stats and features of a regular amulet of glory, except it has unlimited teleport charges instead of the regular four or six maximum charges. However, it cannot be mounted in a player-owned house.

Item ID19707

The amulet of eternal glory is a special dragonstone amulet possessing identical stats and features of a regular amulet of glory, except it has unlimited teleport charges instead of the regular four or six maximum charges. However, it cannot be mounted in a player-owned house.

It is made while charging amulets of glory, or the trimmed variant, with less than six charges, at the Fountain of Rune in the Wilderness. Each amulet recharged has a 1 in 25,000 chance to be turned into an amulet of eternal glory.[1] When this occurs, a message in the chatbox will appear, stating: "The power of the fountain is transferred into an amulet of eternal glory. It will now have unlimited charges."

As with all dragonstone jewellery, it works up to level 30 Wilderness, unlike most other means of teleportation that only work up to level 20 Wilderness.

 Attack bonuses
+10+10+10+10+10
 Defence bonuses
+3+3+3+3+3
 Other bonusesSlot
+6+0+0%+3List

Teleportation options[edit | edit source]

Players can access the teleports by either right-clicking the amulet in their inventory and selecting "rub", or right-clicking it while equipped and selecting one of their destinations.

Destination Map
Edgeville
Karamja
Draynor Village
Al Kharid

The teleport locations allow access to other nearby transportation methods:

  • Edgeville: The canoe system to travel the River Lum, fairy ring dkr to the east, and the Grand Exchange via underwall tunnel, requiring 21 Agility. In the Grand Exchange is access to spirit trees and the Keldagrim minecart system.
  • Karamja: Close proximity to charter ships and the rest of the island via Shilo Village cart system.
  • Draynor Village: Close to Port Sarim for transportation using boats.
  • Al Kharid: A gnome glider to the north and access to the the Shantay Pass, Kharidian Desert, the magic carpet system.

Unlimited Edgeville teleports is useful for rapid bank access as there are a number of different skilling methods made cheaper and/or more efficient with the eternal glory, including:

  • Distraction and Diversions: Shooting star mining and Treasure Trails benefit greatly given the amount of teleporting involved. The Edgeville teleport acts as a rapid "four-click bank" for access to supplies and other required teleports.
  • Questing: Saves time with it always on-hand, if supplies are forgotten, multiple bank trips are required, or trapped in a remote or dangerous location. Combining the teleports with its moderate combat stat bonuses means it can be used virtually everywhere when questing.
  • Ectofuntus worship: Saves time switching out depleted teleport jewellery such as the regular glory or ring of dueling, which are often used in this context for banking. Alternatively, saves an inventory space if using a rune pouch instead for bank teleports.
  • Fishing at Musa Point: Easy banking with the Edgeville teleport, then Karamja teleport takes you straight back to the fishing area.
  • Fishing at Barbarian Village: Easy banking with the Edgeville teleport, however a skull sceptre or running back south is required, but it saves half the travel time.
  • Abyss runecrafting: The eternal glory saves a lot of time and clicks switching out depleted amulets of glory and also helps prevent getting caught without a return teleport after reaching an altar. The money usually put into regular glories should be used on abyssal bracelets to prevent being skulled to minimise risk of the losing the eternal glory and any other useful valuable items while doing Abyss runs, like a ring of endurance, making the bracelet even more useful. With the eternal glory, it is possible to be targeted more often by PKers, therefore, always ensure the abyssal bracelet has charges to avoid skulling. Make sure to have PK Skull Prevention setting enabled or at least the player attack option disabled as well.
  • Lava runecrafting: Use the Edgeville teleport to bank, rather than the Castle Wars teleport with the ring of dueling uses half of the normal ring charges only using it one-way to the Duel Arena at the cost of an inventory space, assuming a binding necklace is equipped. An added benefit is that it will not be possible to be stranded without quick bank access if the last ring of dueling charge is used on the way to the Duel Arena.
  • Picking bananas on Karamja: provides an improved meta over the regular glory & ring of dueling teleport method for bank trips.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The amulet of eternal glory was originally polled as the The Golden Glory, which was changed due to community feedback.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 15 April 2019. (Archived from the original on 25 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "Per glory, regardless of how many charges the glory is gaining. (So long as it's not already fully charged.)"

[[File:Amulet of eternal glory detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''amulet of eternal glory''' is a special [[dragonstone amulet]] possessing identical stats and features of a regular [[amulet of glory]], except it has unlimited [[teleport]] charges instead of the regular four or six maximum charges. However, it cannot be mounted in a [[player-owned house]].

It is made while charging [[Amulet of glory|amulets of glory]], or the [[Amulet of glory (t)|trimmed variant]], with less than six charges, at the [[Fountain of Rune]] in the [[Wilderness]]. Each amulet recharged has a 1 in 25,000 chance to be turned into an amulet of eternal glory.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1117784501206364160|date=15 April 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.is/jXAMh|archivedate=25 May 2020|quote=Per glory, regardless of how many charges the glory is gaining. (So long as it's not already fully charged.)}} When this occurs, a message in the chatbox will appear, stating: "''The power of the fountain is transferred into an amulet of eternal glory. It will now have unlimited charges.''"

As with all dragonstone jewellery, it works up to level 30 [[Wilderness]], unlike most other means of [[teleport]]ation that only work up to level 20 Wilderness.

==Teleportation options==
Players can access the teleports by either right-clicking the amulet in their inventory and selecting "rub", or right-clicking it while equipped and selecting one of their destinations.

{{TeleportLocationTableHead}}
{{TeleportLocationLine|name=[[Edgeville]]|x=3087|y=3496|mtype=pin}}
{{TeleportLocationLine|name=[[Karamja]]|x=2918|y=3176|mtype=pin}}
{{TeleportLocationLine|name=[[Draynor Village]]|x=3105|y=3251|mtype=pin}}
{{TeleportLocationLine|name=[[Al Kharid]]|x=3293|y=3163|mtype=pin}}
{{TableBottom}}

The teleport locations allow access to other nearby transportation methods:
* Edgeville: The [[canoe]] system to travel the [[River Lum]], [[fairy ring]] {{Fairycode|dkr}} to the east, and the [[Grand Exchange]] via [[Underwall tunnel (Grand Exchange)|underwall tunnel]], requiring 21 [[Agility]]. In the Grand Exchange is access to [[spirit tree]]s and the [[Keldagrim minecart system]].
* Karamja: Close proximity to [[charter ship]]s and the rest of the island via [[Shilo Village cart system]].
* Draynor Village: Close to [[Port Sarim]] for transportation using boats.
* Al Kharid: A [[gnome glider]] to the north and access to the the [[Shantay Pass]], [[Kharidian Desert]], the [[magic carpet]] system.

Unlimited [[Edgeville]] teleports is useful for rapid bank access as there are a number of different skilling methods made cheaper and/or more efficient with the eternal glory, including:

*[[Distraction and Diversion]]s: [[Shooting star]] mining and [[Treasure Trails]] benefit greatly given the amount of teleporting involved. The Edgeville teleport acts as a rapid "four-click bank" for access to supplies and other required teleports.

*[[Quest]]ing: Saves time with it always on-hand, if supplies are forgotten, multiple bank trips are required, or trapped in a remote or dangerous location. Combining the teleports with its moderate combat stat bonuses means it can be used virtually everywhere when questing.

* [[Ectofuntus]] worship: Saves time switching out depleted teleport jewellery such as the regular glory or [[ring of dueling]], which are often used in this context for banking. Alternatively, saves an inventory space if using a rune pouch instead for bank teleports.

*[[Fishing]] at [[Musa Point]]: Easy banking with the Edgeville teleport, then Karamja teleport takes you straight back to the fishing area.

*Fishing at [[Barbarian Village]]: Easy banking with the Edgeville teleport, however a [[skull sceptre]] or running back south is required, but it saves half the travel time.

*[[Abyss]] [[runecraft]]ing: The eternal glory saves a lot of time and clicks switching out depleted amulets of glory and also helps prevent getting caught without a return teleport after reaching an altar. The money usually put into regular glories should be used on [[abyssal bracelet]]s to prevent being [[skull]]ed to minimise risk of the losing the eternal glory and any other useful valuable items while doing Abyss runs, like a [[ring of endurance]], making the bracelet even more useful. With the eternal glory, it is possible to be targeted more often by PKers, therefore, '''always''' ensure the abyssal bracelet has charges to avoid skulling. Make sure to have PK Skull Prevention setting enabled or at least the player attack option disabled as well.

*[[Lava runecrafting]]: Use the Edgeville teleport to bank, rather than the Castle Wars teleport with the [[ring of dueling]] uses half of the normal ring charges only using it one-way to the [[Duel Arena]] at the cost of an inventory space, assuming a [[binding necklace]] is equipped. An added benefit is that it will not be possible to be stranded without quick bank access if the last ring of dueling charge is used on the way to the Duel Arena.

* [[Money making guide/Picking bananas|Picking bananas]] on Karamja: provides an improved meta over the regular glory & ring of dueling teleport method for bank trips.

==Trivia==
*The amulet of eternal glory was originally [[Poll:Old School Content Poll 44: PvP & Player-owned houses|polled]] as the ''The Golden Glory'', which was changed due to community feedback.
